an3.146:1.1: “Someone with three qualities is placed in hell as if delivered there.
an3.146:1.3: Unskillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.146:1.4: Someone with these three qualities is placed in hell as if delivered there.
an3.146:2.1: Someone with three qualities is placed in heaven as if delivered there.
an3.146:2.3: Skillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.146:2.4: Someone with these three qualities is placed in heaven as if delivered there.”
